1. Increase the amount of reliable citation sources present in the articles. This would provide readers with more evidence to back up the claims made. 
2. Introduce a collaboration system where users can easily suggest and discuss changes to an article. This would encourage community input and quality control of the articles. 
3. Reorganize the search and navigation system on the platform. This could include categories, better tagging and a more user-friendly interface. This would make it easier for users to locate the information they are looking for.
